ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Or does He have daughters whereas you have sons?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Or does Allah have daughters whereas you have sons?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Do the daughters belong to Him and the sons to you?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: What! The daughters for Him, and the sons for you?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Or has He only daughters and you have sons
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Or has He daughters while you have sons?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Or has He daughters, and they sons?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Or hath He daughters whereas ye have sons?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Does God have daughters while you have sons?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Hath He daughters and ye sons?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Does He have daughters while you have sons?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Or has He only daughters and ye have sons?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Or has He (Allah) only daughters and you have sons?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Or, has He daughters, and they sons?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Or for Him the daughters, and for you the sons?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Or has He daughters while you have sons?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [52:39] Or does He have daughters, as you claim, whereas you have sons? Exalted be God above what you claim!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Or hath He daughters) or are you pleased for attributing daughters to Him while you yourselves dislike them (whereas ye have sons) whereas you chose sons?
